title: Are these good Jax Jungle builds?
body:
So if I get in a game where I either get fed or just don't die and get huge in farm and XP, I wanna try to experiment with different orders of items to play around with my power.

Of course there's the standard {{item:3153}} and {{item:3124}} , maybe even {{item:3078}} , and {{item:1416}} is a given on jungle jax. What about other builds tho? Let's say I go {{item:1416}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} . I run around doin crit damage, and obviously shiv helps my waveclear, and IE boosts the chance and power of crits. I could also try {{item:3046}} if I really wanna push out crit damage.

Other build ideas I have are "lethality jax", {{item:3142}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3814}} . Ghostblade gives me extra MS when I need it, I got the spell shield for goin in on a team with CC. I could also opt for bruiser jax: {{item:1416}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3065}} . 

Any experienced jax players gimme insight on these build ideas? How good can they be? What situations could they be weak or strong? I don't layout entire builds because generally it doesn't seem like you ever wanna go full damage jax, you want at least a tank item or 2 and obviously that differs per game.
